task.title: Insert a picture from Internet in a PowerPoint presentation
task.shortdesc: In this section, you will learn how to insert a picture from Internet in a PowerPoint presentation.

taskbody.prereq:
You must have
Windows 7 or newer
Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 or newer
A PowerPoint presentation
Internet connection
Steps:

step.cmd: Type the image in the Search bar and press Enter.
Select Insertto insert the picture in the current slide.

result.p: You have inserted a picture from Internet in the PowerPoint presentation.
